lines.text: Oh come on, babe, what's the matter?

What's the matter? I've got a show to do in five days, the lighting man appears to be learning on the set, my secretary has been attacked, David is dead, and oh yes, there is some fruit cake out there who wants to kill me. Now to satisfy you more, will you please get the hell out of here!
Dear bitch, see how accessible you are? How would you liked to be fucked with a meat cleaver?
If you should be so ill-advised as to write her any more letters, I can assure you there will be no reply.

Now I know why I haven't heard from you. Your secretary has been intercepting my letters. Obviously she is jealous of our relationship. Her possessiveness worries me. Has it occurred to you that she might have lesbian tendencies? I think you should get rid of her. I will put all of this in a letter and deliver it to you directly. I won't use my last name or return address. You know where to write me.
Look, how long have we been together?
Seven years. I must be a masochist.
